resources.string: Cannot retrieve user manual from the web
Failed to install user manual translation

TopoDroid cannot access its old folder.
Close the app and grant FILES ACCESS using the Settings app.

See http://marcocorvi.altervista.org/HowtoGrantStorageAccess.pdf

With Android-13 TopoDroid must store surveys in the app private folder under "Android/data". Beware that this folder is usually deleted when the app is uninstalled. To confirm type\n"%1$s"\nin the field below and tap the button.
Set the text size.\nYou can always change this later through the main window settings.
Set the button size.\nYou can always change this later through the main window settings.
Set the sketch icon size.\nYou can always change this later through the sketch window settings.

The basic setup is done.

 If you experience problems with the DistoX connection, try and set the insecure socket.

 There are other settings for the presentation of the sketches (icon size, label size, line width etc.); you can set them later.

TopoDroid cannot run without these permissions:
Some functions are disabled without these permissions:

Thank you for choosing TopoDroid. 

TopoDroid is an Open Source Android app for surveying caves with DistoX, BRIC, and SAP. 

No warranty: by using it you agree that the author is not responsible for any loss of data you might incur or damage whatsoever. 

Help: menu "HELP" 
Man pages: Book icon in the Help dialog 
Docs: http://sites.google.com/site/speleoapps 
Privacy policy: http://marcocorvi.altervista.org/policy/TopoDroid-PrivacyPolicy.txt 
Comments, bug reports, feature requests: marco.corvi@gmail.com

READ THE HELP BEFORE ATTEMPTING A FIRMWARE UPLOAD 
This is only a reminder: 
[1] Select either to upload a firmware or to dump the firmware to a file. 
[2] Choose the file to upload or save. Firmware files are in the bin directory. 
[3] Make sure the upload firmware version is compatible with the DistoX hardware version. 
[4] Put the DistoX2 in bootloader mode: press PLUS and MINUS while switching on with DIST key. 
[5] Tap the OK button. 
[6] Read the message before you confirm to continue. 
[7] Wait till the process is done. It takes a while. 
[8] Turn off the DistoX2 with the CLR key.
Firmware file does not look correct.\nUpload anyway? (be patient)
